import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Form, Tabs, Input, Select, Col, Row, Button, Modal, Tag, Slider, InputNumber, AutoComplete } from 'antd' import { EnvironmentOutlined, PlusCircleOutlined, PlusOutlined, SearchOutlined, UploadOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Arrowup from '../../assets/img/iconos/upload.svg' import './areasypuestos.scss' const { TextArea } = Input; const { Option } = Select; const { TabPane } = Tabs; export default function Miempresa() { const tabs = ['1',"2"]; const [Active, setActive] = useState(tabs[0]); const changeActive = () => { if(Active === "1"){ setActive(tabs[1]); }else{ setActive(tabs[0]); } } const options = [ { value: 'CEO', }, { value: 'Marketing', }, { value: 'Ventas', }, ]; return ( <>

option.value.toUpperCase().indexOf(inputValue.toUpperCase()) !== -1 } />
